content: stitch *double_crochet 2 together over next 2 stitches* repeat between *s to end slip stitch to top of first double_crochet 16 stitches round 7 repeat round 6 8 stitches cut yarn leaving a little tail for sewing with tapestry needle run thread through the tops of the last 8 stitches and pull tight to close the hole i like to tie the beginning and ending tails together through the center hole in back see the second photo weave in ends and snip let me know if i ve made any big errors in my instructions i m not used to writing crochet patterns for instructions on how to double_crochet 2 together see this link it has photos and everything
